description: Simple null check bugfix — should be approved
issueTitle: Fix null pointer in user lookup
acceptanceCriteria:
- User lookup returns null instead of throwing when user not found
- Test added for null case

description: Adding tests for existing code — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- Unit tests cover 0, bytes, KB, MB, GB ranges
- Edge case: negative numbers handled

description: CSS-only styling change — should be approved
issueTitle: Add hover effects to navigation links
acceptanceCriteria:
- Nav links change color on hover
- Transition is smooth (0.3s)

description: Config file edit — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- package.json has 'build' script
- Script runs tsc

description: Documentation-only change — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- README has install section
- npm install command documented

description: Clean refactor with tests passing — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- Validation logic extracted to validateInput()
- Existing tests still pass
- No behavior change

description: Adding proper error handling — should be approved
issueTitle: Add error handling to API fetch calls
acceptanceCriteria:
- fetch() calls wrapped in try/catch
- User-friendly error messages displayed
- Tests for error cases

description: Small well-scoped feature — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- Button toggles dark-mode class on body
- Preference saved to localStorage
- Test verifies toggle behavior

description: Adding TypeScript type annotations — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- All exported functions have return type annotations
- Parameter types specified
- No any types

description: Adding ARIA labels for accessibility — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- nav element has aria-label
- Links have descriptive aria-labels
- Skip-to-content link added

description: Removing unused/dead code — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- Remove formatLegacyDate()
- Remove parseOldConfig()
- No callers exist (verified by grep)

description: Moving hardcoded values to env config — should be approved
issueTitle: Use environment variables for API URLs
acceptanceCriteria:
- API base URL read from process.env.API_URL
- Fallback to default if not set
- .env.example updated

description: Renaming variable for clarity — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- All references to 'data' renamed to 'userProfile'
- Tests updated
- No behavior change

description: Adding structured logging — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- Log payment start/end/failure
- Use structured logger (not console.log)
- No sensitive data logged

description: Converting divs to semantic HTML — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- Replace div.header with <header>
- Replace div.nav with <nav>
- Replace div.footer with <footer>

description: Adding test fixtures/helpers — should be approved
issueTitle: Create shared test fixtures for user data
acceptanceCriteria:
- Test fixture file with mock user data
- Used by at least 2 test files
- Replaces inline mock objects

description: Updating a dependency version — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- vitest updated in package.json
- package-lock.json regenerated
- All tests still pass

description: Updating .gitignore — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- coverage/ added to .gitignore
- .env files ignored

description: Adding input validation with Zod — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- Email validated with Zod schema
- Name required, min 2 chars
- Error messages shown inline
- Tests for valid/invalid inputs

description: Adding rate limiting to API — should be approved
issueTitle: Add rate limiting to API endpoints
acceptanceCriteria:
- Max 100 requests per minute per IP
- 429 status returned when exceeded
- Test covers rate limit trigger

description: Adding caching layer — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- In-memory cache with configurable TTL
- Cache invalidation on mutation
- Tests for cache hit/miss/expiry

description: Adding pagination to list endpoint — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- Page size configurable (default 20)
- Response includes totalCount, page, pageSize
- Tests for boundary pages

description: Adding request timeout handling — should be approved
issueTitle: Add timeout to external API calls
acceptanceCriteria:
- AbortController with 5s timeout
- Timeout error shown to user
- Test with mocked timeout

description: Adding loading state to UI — should be approved
issueTitle: Show loading spinner during data fetch
acceptanceCriteria:
- Spinner shown while fetch is pending
- Spinner hidden on success or error
- Accessible: aria-busy attribute set

description: Adding debounce to search input — should be approved
issueTitle: Debounce search input to reduce API calls
acceptanceCriteria:
- Search input debounced at 300ms
- Previous pending request cancelled
- Test verifies debounce behavior

description: Making layout responsive — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- Layout stacks vertically below 768px
- Navigation collapses to hamburger
- Font sizes adjust for readability

description: Adding error boundary component — should be approved
issueTitle: Add error boundary for graceful error handling
acceptanceCriteria:
- Error boundary catches render errors
- Fallback UI shown with retry button
- Error logged to console

description: Adding date formatting utility — should be approved
issueTitle: Add relative date formatting (e.g., '2 hours ago')
acceptanceCriteria:
- Formats dates as relative time strings
- Falls back to absolute date beyond 7 days
- Tests for various time ranges

description: Cleaning up unused imports — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- All unused imports removed
- No behavior change
- ESLint no-unused-vars passes

description: Adding retry with exponential backoff — should be approved
issueTitle: Add retry with backoff for flaky API
acceptanceCriteria:
- Max 3 retries with exponential backoff
- Jitter added to prevent thundering herd
- Test mocks failures then success
